title: For Sale:  1895 N300 Mayo Tom Daly SGC 50 - Highest Graded
author: Basilone

posts.post_title: For Sale:  1895 N300 Mayo Tom Daly SGC 50 - Highest Graded
posts.post_content:
For sale is a 1895 N300 Mayo's Cut Plug Tom Daly SGC 50.  

None graded higher by either SGC or PSA.  Rare card.  

Asking $950.  Insured Shipping included.   

PM if you are interested.   Plenty of hobby references upon request.    

Thanks for looking! 

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersd/basilone/basilonescardfiles//1895M_Daly%20SGC%2050a.jpg[/IMG]
FYI...I'm willing to entertain offers for this card.

Price Reduced.   $850 or Best Offer.

PM or Email if interested.

Thanks -  John
EDIT:  Card now listed on eBay.
